Key Match Events: Naseem Shah struck two match-winning sixes to shatter the hopes of Afghanistan in a one-wicket loss by Pakistan in the last over thriller on September 7
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan captain Mohammad Nabi revealed that players in his team took tranquilisers following their loss against Pakistan in the T20 Asia Cup 2022's Super Four stage match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan lost to Pakistan by one wicket in the last over thriller in the Asia Cup 2022's Super Four stage match held on September 7 in Sharjah
Others: The match was played on September 7, 2022, at the Sharjah Cricket Stadium in Sharjah.
